metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18826 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: There exists a heap-based buffer overflow in vc1_decode_p_mb_intfi invc1_block.c in Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause adenial-of-service via a crafted aac file.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
